beIN SPORTS.title_en: Montpellier vs Chambery - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
beIN SPORTS.desc_en: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s  14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

beIN SPORTS 9.desc: يعود سباق جائزة صاحب السمو الأمير الوالد 2026 في الفترة من 9 إلى 10 يناير 2026، ليجمع بين سباقات الخيول الأصيلة من الدرجة الأولى على مدار يومين من الإثارة التنافسية، ويضم تشكيلة دولية قوية، ومسابقات عالية المخاطر، وأجواء متميزة تحتفي برياضة النخبة، والتقاليد، والمكانة في تقويم السباقات في قطر.

beIN SPORTS 4.title: نيس vs جو أهيد إيجلز - الدوري الأوروبي 2025/2026 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 4.desc: لم يلتقي فريق نيس وجو أهيد إيجلز من قبل في المنافسات الأوروبية - لم يخسر الفريق الفرنسي في جميع المباريات الثلاث على أرضه ضد الفرق الهولندية في أوروبا، وكان آخرها التعادل 2-2 مع إف سي تفينتي في الدوري الأوروبي UEFA الموسم الماضي.
beIN SPORTS 4.title_en: Nice vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 4.desc_en: Nice and Go Ahead Eagles have never met before in European competition – the French side are unbeaten in all three home games against Dutch sides in Europe, most recently a 2-2 draw with FC Twente in the UEFA Europa League last season. Go Ahead Eagles have already lost against French opposition in the UEFA Europa League this season, losing 2-1 away at Lyon in what is their only previous game against a French club.

beIN SPORTS 4.title: فيكتوريا بلزن vs بورتو - الدوري الأوروبي 2025/2026 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 4.desc: هذا هو أول لقاء أوروبي بين فيكتوريا بلزن وبورتو - واجه الفريق التشيكي منافسًا برتغاليًا آخر مرة في دور الـ16 من الدوري الأوروبي 2017-2018، حيث خرج بنتيجة 3-2 في مجموع المباراتين أمام سبورتنج لشبونة.
beIN SPORTS 4.title_en: Viktoria Plzen vs Porto - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 4.desc_en: This is the first European meeting between Viktoria Plzen and FC Porto – the Czechia side last faced Portuguese opponents in the last 16 of the 2017-18 UEFA Europa League, going out 3-2 on aggregate to Sporting CP. FC Porto haven’t faced a Czechia side since the second group stages of the 2001-02 UEFA Champions League, when they lost 1-0 at home and 2-0 away at Sparta Prague.

beIN SPORTS 4.title: سيلتا فيجو vs ليل - الدوري الأوروبي 2025/2026 - MD7

beIN SPORTS 1.title_en: Olympique de Marseille vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
beIN SPORTS 1.desc_en: Marseille have lost their last three UEFA Champions League games against Liverpool, most recently in the 2008-09 group stage. Liverpool have won just one of their last six away games against French sides in all competitions, though it was a 1-0 win at PSG in their most recent visit in March 2025.

beIN SPORTS 1.title: بودو/جليمت vs مانشستر سيتي - دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 - MD7 - مباراة صغيرة

beIN SPORTS 1.title_en: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
beIN SPORTS 1.desc_en: Bodø/Glimt are winless in their six meetings with English sides in European competition, although did manage to avoid defeat in the only one to take place in the UEFA Champions League. This will be Manchester City’s first ever game against a Norwegian opponent. None of the last nine English sides to face a Norwegian team away from home in major European competition have lost, with Chelsea in October 2002 the last to lose there.

beIN SPORTS 1.title_en: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
beIN SPORTS 1.desc_en: Internazionale and Arsenal will meet for the fourth time in the UEFA Champions League – the Italians have won two of the previous three, including one over a Mikel Arteta-led Gunners side in last season’s league phase. Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

beIN SPORTS 1.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
beIN SPORTS 1.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

beIN SPORTS 1.title: Olympique de Marseille vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
beIN SPORTS 1.desc: Marseille have lost their last three UEFA Champions League games against Liverpool, most recently in the 2008-09 group stage. Liverpool have won just one of their last six away games against French sides in all competitions, though it was a 1-0 win at PSG in their most recent visit in March 2025.

beIN SPORTS 1.title: French Super Cup 2025

beIN SPORTS 1.title: Real Madrid vs Monaco - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
beIN SPORTS 1.desc: Real Madrid and Monaco’s only previous meetings came in the quarter-finals of the 2003-04 UEFA Champions League – after winning the first leg at home, the Spanish side were eliminated on the away goals rule following a 3-1 defeat in the reverse fixture. Real Madrid have only lost one of their 18 home games against French sides in major European competition  and are unbeaten in 14 since that lone defeat versus Paris SG in March 1994.

beIN SPORTS 1.title: Slavia Praha vs Barcelona - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match

beIN SPORTS 3.title_en: Rangers vs Ludogorets Razgrad - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: Rangers last faced a Bulgarian side in major European competition in the 1966-67 Cup Winners’ Cup semi-final, beating Slavia Sofia 1-0 in both legs to reach the final. This is Ludogorets’ first European encounter with a Scottish side – their six games against British sides in major competition have all been against English opposition, conceding at least twice in all six.

beIN SPORTS 3.title: أتلتيكو مدريد ضد ديبورتانيفو ألافيس - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع
beIN SPORTS 3.desc: تعادل أتلتيكو مدريد في آخر مباراتين له في الدوري الإسباني ضد ألافيس، وكلاهما في مينديزوروزا، ولم يسجلوا مطلقًا ثلاثة تعادلات متتالية ضد فريق فيتوريا في تاريخ المسابقة.
beIN SPORTS 3.title_en: Atletico Madrid vs Deportivo Alaves - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: Atlético de Madrid have drawn their last two LaLiga matches against Alavés, both at Mendizorroza, and they have never recorded three consecutive draws against the Vitoria side in the history of the competition. Deportivo Alavés have won just one of their 14 away games against Atlético de Madrid in LaLiga, with that sole victory being the only time they have kept a clean sheet  when Jesús Aranguren and Luis Aragonés were in charge of both teams respectively.

beIN SPORTS 3.title: السنغال vs المغرب - نهائي - كأس أمم أفريقيا - المغرب 2025
beIN SPORTS 3.desc: وستكون هذه أول مباراة على الإطلاق في بطولة أمم أفريقيا CAF بين السنغال والمغرب.
beIN SPORTS 3.title_en: Senegal vs Morocco  - Final - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: This will be the first ever CAF Africa of Nations match between Senegal and Morocco. It’s the first final in the competition to see the two teams face each other for the first time since South Africa vs Tunisia in 1996. This is Senegal’s fourth final at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, they’re looking to lift the trophy for the second time, having defeated Egypt on penalties in 2021 after a 0-0 draw

beIN SPORTS 3.title: طرابزون سبور vs قاسم باشا - الدوري التركي الممتاز - MD 19 - 2025-2026
beIN SPORTS 3.desc: الدوري التركي الممتاز هو مسابقة الدرجة الأولى في نظام الدوري التركي لكرة القدم ويتم بثه مباشرة وحصريًا على beIN SPORTS.
beIN SPORTS 3.title_en: Trabzonspor vs Kasimpasa - Turkish Super League - MD 19 - 2025-2026
beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: The Turkish Süper Lig is the top-flight competition of the Turkish football league system and is live and exclusive on beIN SPORTS. The season runs from August to May, with each club playing 38 matches. Matches are played Friday through to Monday. Galatasaray are the current Champions.

beIN SPORTS 3.title: ليفانتي vs إلتشي - الدوري الإسباني 2025/26 - الأسبوع 21
beIN SPORTS 3.desc: خسر ليفانتي مباراة واحدة فقط من أصل ست مباريات على أرضه أمام إلتشي في الدوري الإسباني، وكانت الهزيمة 0-1 في ديسمبر 1963، وكانت تلك أول زيارة لإلتشي على الإطلاق إلى ليفانتي في دوري الدرجة الأولى.
beIN SPORTS 3.title_en: Levante vs Elche - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 21
beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: Levante have lost just one of their six home games against Elche in LaLiga, a 0-1 defeat in December 1963, which was Elche's first ever top-flight visit to Levante. Following their victory in August on Matchday 3, Elche could achieve consecutive wins against Levante for the first time ever in LaLiga history.

beIN SPORTS 3.title: سبورتينج لشبونة vs باريس سان جيرمان - دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 3.desc: هذا هو أول لقاء أوروبي على الإطلاق بين سبورتنج لشبونة وباريس سان جيرمان - سيكون الفريق الفرنسي الثاني عشر الذي يواجهه سبورتنج بشكل عام في أوروبا، والأول منذ فوزه على مرسيليا 2-1 في الجولة الثالثة هذا الموسم في دوري أبطال أوروبا.
beIN SPORTS 3.title_en: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: Qarabag versus Eintracht Frankfurt will be the first meeting between sides from Azerbaijan and Germany in the history of the European Cup/UEFA Champions League. Qarabag and Eintracht Frankfurt have faced each other twice previously, with the German side winning home  and away  in a play-off qualifier for the 2013-14 UEFA Europa League.

beIN SPORTS 3.title: تشيلسي vs بافوس - دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 3.desc: هذا هو اللقاء الثالث لتشيلسي على الإطلاق مع منافس قبرصي، حيث فاز 1-0 خارج أرضه وتعادل 2-2 على أرضه مع أبويل نيقوسيا في دوري أبطال أوروبا 2009-10 سابقًا.
beIN SPORTS 3.title_en: Chelsea vs Pafos - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
beIN SPORTS 3.desc_en: This is just Chelsea’s third ever meeting with Cypriot opposition, winning 1-0 away and drawing 2-2 at home with APOEL Nicosia in the 2009-10 UEFA Champions League previously. This is Pafos’ first ever meeting with English opposition. Cypriot sides have only won one of their 21 meetings with English teams in all competitions, with AEK Larnaca winning 1-0 at Crystal Palace in this season’s UEFA Conference League.

beIN SPORTS NEWS.desc: في عالم الرياضة، القليل من المناقشات هي التي تثير الشغف والحماس، تمامًا مثل النقاش الدائر حول أعظم لاعبي كرة القدم على مر العصور.
beIN SPORTS NEWS.desc_en: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.
